definition: A body part located on the sides of the head, typically used for hearing and maintaining balance, often covered by hair. It is commonly used to perceive sounds and plays a crucial role in communication and auditory perception.

examples.english: The ear is a sensory organ.

examples.german: Ich habe mir das Ohr verletzt.
Sie hat ein Hörgerät im Ohr.
examples.english: She has a hearing aid in her ear.
